title: REPORT THE BUG TO YOUTUBE
body:
'ytcfg' is undefined on YOUTUBE. report it so YOUTUBE can fix it
A window opened saying a bug was found on this page, it asked if I would like to debug it, I DO NOT OWN YOUTUBE, YOUTUBE NEEDS TO BE MADE AWARE THIS BUG IS ON THEIR WEBSITE SO THEY CAN FIX IT, WHY DOES THE DEBUGGER ASK ME TO FIX IT, AND NOT SEND A REPORT TO YOUTUBE AS IT SHOULD
